summary: A documentary-style drama about the "Fouke Monster", a Bigfoot-type creature that has been sighted in and around Fouke, Arkansas since the 1950s.
cast: Vern Stierman|Chuck Pierce Jr.|William Stumpp|Willie E. Smith|Lloyd Bowen|B.R. Barrington|J.E. 'Smokey' Crabtree|Travis Crabtree|John P. Hixon|John W. Oates|Buddy Crabtree|Jeff Crabtree|Judy Haltom|Mary B. Johnson|Louise Searcy|Dina Louise Savell|Phillip Bradley|Bill Hunt|Monroe E. Smith|Eddie J. Dalmes|James E. Cobb|William Wright|Eddy Berdig|Jerry Chapman|Rickey Ashley|Dave R. Templeton|John Knight Jr.|Dudley Pickens|James Cornell|Gene Ross|Thomas Templeton|Herb Jones|Steve Lyons|Patty Dougan|Dennis Lamb|Loraine Lamb|George Dobson|Dave Ball|Jim Nicklus|Flo Pierce|Pamula Pierce|Tammy Harper|Bobby Splawn|Charles Walraven|Robin Raffaelli|Cathy Cox|Jinger Hawkins|Glenn Carruth|Bunny Dees|John Wallis|Sarah Coble|Dave O'Brien|Billy Crawford|James Tennison|Ernest Walraven|Amanda Pierce|Aaron Ball|Ken McElroy|Sarah Brewers|Glenda Page|Sandra Peabody
title: The Legend of Boggy Creek
